item.title: Nightclub Fire Kills at Least 59 in North Macedonia
item.description: The tragedy occurred after fireworks set the club’s roof on fire during a pop concert, the country’s interior minister said.

item.title: Ukraine Retreats From Most of Russia’s Kursk Region
item.description: The daring campaign Ukraine launched last summer to seize and occupy Russian territory appears to be nearing an end.

item.title: Children Try to Cheer Pope Francis During His Hospital Stay
item.description: Dozens of young people gathered under the pontiff’s windows at the Gemelli hospital to offer wishes for a quick recovery.

item.title: East African Housekeepers Face Rape, Assault and Death in Saudi Arabia
item.description: East African leaders and Saudi royals are among those profiting off a lucrative, deadly trade in domestic workers.

item.title: Houthis Vow Retaliation After U.S. Strikes in Yemen
item.description: The Iran-backed rebels, who have targeted Israel and shipping in the Red Sea, said children were among those killed in the strikes ordered by Presiden...
